byline.original: By ALBERT R. HUNT | BLOOMBERG VIEW

lead_paragraph: Many in Iowa complain that they have been foot soldiers for the conservative movement, after which the party ends up nominating a moderate.

headline.main: Republicans Battle for the Right in Iowa
headline.print_headline: Republicans Battle for the Right in Iowa

snippet: Many in Iowa complain that they have been foot soldiers for the conservative movement, after which the party ends up nominating a moderate.
